Description:
After defeating the three pirate captains, you are proclaimed the true Pirate King! Wealth, fame, and power await the holder of this title, though it is a pity it is only recognized in the Sahti Islands.

As the victor, you choose to sail on one of the three defeated captains' magical ships into calm waters to prepare for your journey into the deeps.
EventName: You are the true pirate king
